actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to ensure timely action under the provisions of the trade laws safeguarding national security.
short_title: Trade and National Security Safeguard Act of 1985

summary.text: Trade and National Security Safeguard Act of 1985 - Amends the Trade Expansion Act of 1969 to require the President, within 120 days of receiving a report from the Secretary of Commerce containing findings and recommendations on the dangers that certain imports pose to the defense mobilization and national security of the United States, to decide whether to accept the Secretary's recommendations.

titles.title: Trade and National Security Safeguard Act of 1985
A bill to ensure timely action under the provisions of the trade laws safeguarding national security.
